GSD.description:
loop: Check for overflow while configuring loop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 0455bef69028c65065f16bb04635591b2374249b. For more details please see the references link.
